title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
OB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard, a message appears at the top that says 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists', even though the package name field is empty.
EB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard, the message 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists' should not be displayed if the package name field is empty.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new Java Project. 
2. Select the project. 
3. Invoke the New Java Package wizard.
